text: An ''''' is a writ which issued out of chancery to prohibit an excommunicated person from every legal act, so that he or she cannot act, nor sue any person, but he may be sued by others."Excommunicato interdictur omnls actus legitimus, its quod agere non potest, nee aliquem convenire, licet ipse ab aliis possit convenlri" Legal Dictionaries of the Encyclopedia of Law Project ==References== Category:Ecclesiastical writs Category:Latin legal terminology Category:Quotations from law Category:Canon law of the Church of England
title: Excommunicato interdictur omnis actus legitimus, ita quod agere non potest, nec aliquem convenire, licet ipse ab aliis possit conveniri
